entry.title: ajstyle4u/DivCopy: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.

entry.title: watanabe-1/rpc4next: Inspired by Hono RPC and Pathpida, rpc4next brings a lightweight and intuitive RPC solution to Next.js, making server-client communication seamless

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
entry.content: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: ChiefBoyardee/mcp-feature-tracker: A lightweight Node.js server implementing Model Context Protocol for basic project tracking (tasks, notes, decisions, goals) using SQLite. For use with AI Tools such as Cursor, Windsurf, Cline, and others.
entry.content: A lightweight Node.js server implementing Model Context Protocol for basic project tracking (tasks, notes, decisions, goals) using SQLite. For use with AI Tools such as Cursor, Windsurf, Cline, and others.

entry.title: jeeveshlodhi/diffusion: 🌀 Diffusion is a fast, lightweight diff checker built with React + Tauri. Compare text or code files, highlight changes, and get similarity scores — all with a sleek native UI and local processing.
entry.content: 🌀 Diffusion is a fast, lightweight diff checker built with React + Tauri. Compare text or code files, highlight changes, and get similarity scores — all with a sleek native UI and local processing.

entry.title: dipeshmurmu2005/itstoaster: itstoaster is a lightweight, dependency-free toast notification library for modern web apps. It provides customizable success, error, info, and warning toasts with minimal setup and no external dependencies.

entry.title: yeyunwen/seamless-scroll: Lightweight, high-performance seamless scrolling component with support for React and Vue frameworks.轻量级、高性能的无缝滚动组件，支持React和Vue框架。

entry.title: arjunjins/personal-cloud: I'm working on a hobby project that mocks some core features of Google Cloud. The idea is to create a lightweight, local version of things like authentication, storage, and basic APIs—kind of like a mini cloud you can run on your own machine.
entry.content: I'm working on a hobby project that mocks some core features of Google Cloud. The idea is to create a lightweight, local version of things like authentication, storage, and basic APIs—kind of like a mini cloud you can run on your own machine.
